settings.title: havin' the craic from head to toe

settings.text:
Wearable Art Edition 2019 with FUCHSIA McAREE 

We are extremely excited about bringing you another Artist Edtion socks, this time with insanely talented Fuchsia McAree.Living and working in Dublin, Fuchsia MacAree makes playful character-based illustrations.
Her work highlights awkward moments, quiet interactions and Irish oddities, and depicts simplified perspectives with a distinctive colour palette.
